feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.3.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Avoid duplicated names on creating components by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15465
  • Validate custom components by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15469

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.3.5...3.3.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add dummy action buttons for new panels by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15359
  • Add side nav tabs for bindings and state by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15390
  • Bindings explorer panel by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15403
  • State explorer panel by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15365
  • Adds handling for more delimiters when importing .CSVs by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15458
  • clear results context on every run by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15472
  • Fixes to address state usage misses by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15464
  • State and bindings panels by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15426
  • Table column "format" setting by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15457

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.3.6...3.4.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Extract componenterrors from client by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15445
  • Picker bug fix by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15481

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.0...3.4.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Move trigger definitions to shared-core. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15475
  • Modernise automation step tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15478
  • Detect iframe clicks via loss of focus by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15483
  • Fix searching for a date on a string field. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15489

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.1...3.4.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update type by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15490
  • Update pro ref by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15492

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.2...3.4.3
